message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.IR, cs.SD, cs.MM

This paper deals with microblog classification, which involves natural language processing and machine learning techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also involves social media analysis, which falls under the scope of cs.SI (Social and Information Networks). The use of distant supervision and transfer learning techniques for classification tasks suggests that the paper could also be classified under cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.SD (Software Engineering). Finally, the paper mentions the use of YouTube videos, which could involve multimedia analysis and therefore be classified under cs.MM (Multimedia).
